resources.string: Choose the price range you are willing to pay
For more information, press and hold any range button
The recommended options for the processors of that brand are the following ones
The components that will be shown will be low-end and mid-range, the general appearance of the computer will be basic and the possibility of further improvement will be limited

The components that will be shown will be mid-range and high-end, the general appearance of the computer may be both basic and minimalist or adopt a more colorful appearance, the possibility of subsequent improvement will no longer be so limited

The components that will be shown will be high-end, the general appearance of the computer may be basic and minimalist or adopt a more attractive and quality appearance, the possibility of improvement will not be limited in any way
The manufacturer of the chosen processor is:
, it is recommended to choose an AMD GPU since its performance improves up to 15%.
, it is recommended to choose an NVIDIA GPU since its performance will be increased.

, it is advisable to choose RAM memories whose maximum frequencies are 3600Mhz since this complies with the AMD INFINITY FABRIC interconnection architecture and improves the general performance of the computer considerably.
, it is advisable to choose RAM memories whose frequencies are greater than 2133 Mhz to obtain good performance.
